channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Trade Deadline Buzz: Latest Intel on Selling Teams, Players to Watch
item.description: FOX Sports' Ralph Vacchiano and Eric D. Williams break down what they're hearing ahead of the NFL trade deadline on Nov. 4.

item.title: Tom Brady's Message to Lamar Jackson, J.J. McCarthy as They Return From Injury
item.description: Tom Brady related his injury experience to what Lamar Jackson and J.J. McCarthy might feel this week.

item.title: 2025 NFL AFC, NFC Title Odds: Chiefs, Lions Favored Heading Into Week 9
item.description: Who will represent the AFC and NFC in the Super Bowl? See the odds now that we've reached the midway point of the NFL season.

item.title: Tom Brady on the Mindset Lamar Jackson & J.J. McCarthy Need to Overcome Injury ðŸ˜¤
item.description: Tom Brady breaks down the emotional and strategic side of returning to the field after a major injury. In this episode of Story Time with Tom, the GOA...

item.title: Blue Jays Game 5 Star Trey Yesavage Achieved Incredibly Rare World Series Feat
item.description: Trey Yesavage pulled off a feat that just three other pitchers in the history of the World Series have managed before, two of them Hall of Famers.

item.title: Sources: Feds eye MLBPA venture over spending
item.description: Players Way was cited in an anonymous whistleblower complaint last November that triggered an ongoing criminal investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Of...

item.title: Reaves' run rolls on as buzzer-beater lifts Lakers
item.description: Austin Reaves continued his dream week, adding to a 51-point performance and a 41-point game with a floater at the buzzer that rescued the Lakers.

item.title: Famed Jim Irsay collection to be sold at auction
item.description: The Irsay family will auction off the majority of the memorabilia collection owned by Jim Irsay -- a compilation of items for which the late Colts own...

item.title: What we're hearing about the open Power 4 jobs and what comes next
item.description: Coaching changes are happening fast. With a month left in the season, here are six things to monitor.

item.title: Only four teams have made the playoffs after having a 1% chance. The Ravens think they'll be the fifth
item.description: If it's going to take 10 wins to clinch a playoff berth or the division, Baltimore will need to win eight of its next 10 games.
